articles.author: Paul Tassi
articles.title: 'Bridgerton' Dethroned Again In Netflix's Top 10 List By A New Show - Forbes
articles.description: Here's what new show has knocked Bridgerton off the #1 spot in Netflix's top 10 list again.
articles.content:
Bridgerton 
Netflix
Bridgerton keeps bouncing all around the #1 spot on Netflix as shows pass it then retreat again. First it was the low-budget comedy Tires, and now its Dancing for the Devil: The… [+2240 chars]

articles.title: Why Anjana Vasan is done people pleasing - BBC.com
articles.description: The actress says she has a lot in common with her character Amina in We Are Lady Parts.
articles.content:
By Noor Nanji & Yasmin Rufo,Culture reporters
The actress Anjana Vasan has a lot in common with her character Amina in We Are Lady Parts.
Both refuse to be people pleasers, both say no when nec… [+5006 chars]
